name: Snowboard Commando
description:
You are a member of an elite secret force known only as Snowboard Commando.

All you have is high caliber machine gun and a snowboard. Your mission is to travel to Kazakhstan, Estonia, Siberia, and North Korea to save the world from total destruction.

Use your snowboard to navigate around trees, rocks, and gunfire from enemy helicopters. Use your machine gun to shoot the enemies that killed your squadron and to shoot down enemy air support that is shooting at you.

 GAME FEATURES:  

- 3D Graphics 
- Realistic Sound Effects 
- 36 Total Levels, Spanning 4 Acts
- Realistic Snowboard Physics
- Multiple Difficulty Levels 

Each level increases in difficulty to the point where you literally have to blow up everything to survive. "Snowboard Commando" is your destiny.

" Good Luck Soldier, nothing can stop you now"

From the makers of iBaseJump, iRollercoaster, and World Winter Games
